name: double-pendulum-psec-interactive2
info:
# Double pendulum, Poincare map (interactive 2)

Generates Poincare map for ?[double pendulum](/doc#box/DoublePendulum) system that consists of two links moving in a vertical plane.

Map cross-section is the hyperplane q2=0. The output is the projection of Poincare map onto plane (q1, dq1).

User can change initial conditions by moving sliders (due to **isInput** box of type ?[RangeInput](/doc#box/RangeInput). It is also possible to clear image using the **clear** button.
